actions.text: Referred to Joint Committee on Atomic Energy.

official_title: A bill to obtain adequate nuclear information essential to congressional decisions.

summary.text: Requires the Joint Committee on Atomic Energy to make continuing studies of the development, use, and control of Atomic Energy. Requires the Atomic Energy Commission and the Department of Defense to keep the committee fully informed of their activities with respect to the development and application of atomic energy.

titles.title: A bill to obtain adequate nuclear information essential to congressional decisions.
